scripts.build: react-scripts build && yarn mv:js && yarn mv:css
scripts.build:package: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css && NODE_ENV=production npx babel src/ -d dist/ --copy-files
scripts.mv:js: mv build/static/js/runtime~main.*.js dist/js/runtime~main.js && mv build/static/js/main.*.chunk.js dist/js/main.js && mv build/static/js/2.*.chunk.js dist/js/2.js
scripts.mv:css: mv build/static/css/2.*.chunk.css dist/css/2.css && mv build/static/css/main.*.chunk.css dist/css/main.css
